title: Our changing cities - can they be saved?
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and William Kay
brief_description: A short history of the development of cities in the United States. Accounts for the social forces and movements which have shaped modern cities, and describes city life of the past and present. Designed for children.
